body:
## Expected Behavior
Currently the only reason for StartChildWorklfowExecution failure is already running. But the enum also contains  UnknownExternalWorkflowExecution which doesn't make sense when starting a workflow. 

The same enum is used when signalling and cancelling external executions.
The solution is to separate this enum in two. One for starting workflows another for other operations.
title: StartChildWorklfowExecution.WorkflowExecutionFailedCause doesn't make sense
